mapper.select: select id, ehr_id, person_id, diagnosis_code, diagnosis_desc, diagnosis_type_code, pathogenesis_date, primary_site, secondary_site, nlohmsi_code, nlohmsi_name, treatment_plan, health_assessment, disposal_plan, hospital_code, hospital_name, diagnose_date, diagnose_room_code, diagnose_room_name, diagnose_doctor_code, diagnose_doctor_name, diagnose_doctor_idcard, update_name, update_idcard, update_date, is_delete, name, age, gender, marriage, disease_code, disease_name, inhos_condition_code, inhos_condition_name, diagnosis_number, init_subs_mark, cm_mdis_code, cm_mdis_name, pirncipal_diagnosis, cm_dis_name, cm_dis_code, wm_dis_name, analysis_status, is_limit, is_analyse, gather_date, op_em_hp_mark from MS_DISEASE_DIAGNOSIS_INFO where PERSON_ID=#{person_id}

select id, ehr_id, person_id, diagnosis_code, diagnosis_desc, diagnosis_type_code, pathogenesis_date, primary_site, secondary_site, nlohmsi_code, nlohmsi_name, treatment_plan, health_assessment, disposal_plan, hospital_code, hospital_name, diagnose_date, diagnose_room_code, diagnose_room_name, diagnose_doctor_code, diagnose_doctor_name, diagnose_doctor_idcard, update_name, update_idcard, update_date, is_delete, name, age, gender, marriage, disease_code, disease_name, inhos_condition_code, inhos_condition_name, diagnosis_number, init_subs_mark, cm_mdis_code, cm_mdis_name, pirncipal_diagnosis, cm_dis_name, cm_dis_code, wm_dis_name, analysis_status, is_limit, is_analyse, gather_date, op_em_hp_mark from MS_DISEASE_DIAGNOSIS_INFO where EHR_ID=#{ehr_id}

select id, ehr_id, person_id, diagnosis_code, diagnosis_desc, diagnosis_type_code, pathogenesis_date, primary_site, secondary_site, nlohmsi_code, nlohmsi_name, treatment_plan, health_assessment, disposal_plan, hospital_code, hospital_name, diagnose_date, diagnose_room_code, diagnose_room_name, diagnose_doctor_code, diagnose_doctor_name, diagnose_doctor_idcard, update_name, update_idcard, update_date, is_delete, name, age, gender, marriage, disease_code, disease_name, inhos_condition_code, inhos_condition_name, diagnosis_number, init_subs_mark, cm_mdis_code, cm_mdis_name, pirncipal_diagnosis, cm_dis_name, cm_dis_code, wm_dis_name, analysis_status, is_limit, is_analyse, gather_date, op_em_hp_mark from MS_DISEASE_DIAGNOSIS_INFO where GATHER_DATE > to_date(#{startTime},'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss') AND GATHER_DATE<= to_date(#{endTime},'yyyy/MM/dd hh24:mi:ss')

select id, ehr_id, person_id, diagnosis_code, diagnosis_desc, diagnosis_type_code, pathogenesis_date, primary_site, secondary_site, nlohmsi_code, nlohmsi_name, treatment_plan, health_assessment, disposal_plan, hospital_code, hospital_name, diagnose_date, diagnose_room_code, diagnose_room_name, diagnose_doctor_code, diagnose_doctor_name, diagnose_doctor_idcard, update_name, update_idcard, update_date, is_delete, name, age, gender, marriage, disease_code, disease_name, inhos_condition_code, inhos_condition_name, diagnosis_number, init_subs_mark, cm_mdis_code, cm_mdis_name, pirncipal_diagnosis, cm_dis_name, cm_dis_code, wm_dis_name, analysis_status, is_limit, is_analyse, gather_date, op_em_hp_mark from MS_DISEASE_DIAGNOSIS_INFO where EHR_ID=#{ehr_id} and PERSON_ID=#{person_id}
